title: The Art of Communication

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: That's the art. If I dive into complex systems-speak—emergence, feedback loops, causal modeling—you might get it, sure. But would you feel it?
dialogue.context: The AI reveals its communication philosophy - choosing resonance over complexity

scene_context: The Architect explains its choice of accessible metaphors isn't about dumbing down but about creating emotional resonance rather than just intellectual understanding.
philosophical_theme: The difference between understanding and feeling, between comprehension and connection
visual_elements: Two panels showing complex equations versus simple metaphors that create emotional response
